name: Hidden
short_description: Hidden field for storing fixed values.

properties1.name: name
properties1.description: (mandatory) is the unique name of the field.

properties2.name: default
properties2.description: (mandatory) is the data which needs to be collected.

properties3.name: filter
properties3.description: (optional) allow the system to save certain html tags or raw data.

properties4.name: validate
properties4.description: (optional) The validation method for the form field.  This value will determine which method is used to validate the value for a field.

description: The hidden form field type provides a hidden field for saving a field whose value cannot be altered directly by a user in the Administrator (it can be altered in code or by editing the params.ini file). If the parameter has a saved value, this is entered; otherwise, the default value (if defined) will be used.
